attributes.action: Support The Marsh Grass Roots Sports Legacy
attributes.additional_details:
We want the Government to provide up to date grass roots facilities at the Marsh Sports Area in Weymouth as a legacy for all the community to use which is both affordable to all and accessible to all.

The area at present is totally unusable for the majority of sports and needs updating in order that the community and schools can use it on a regular basis instead of the once a year that they use it now depending on the weather.

Please sign this petition if you support the idea of a community sporting facility at the Marsh area in Weymouth.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
